Articles.Content:
So I tried posting this on the official site and got no response, so decided to go to this community instead. Is there any way to reset the warband settings to default?

EDIT: Fixed, for anyone having the same problem heres my fix:

Go to C:\Users\(your user here)\Documents\Mount&Blade Warband then delete rgl_config.txt.

Edited July 27, 2014 by JokingHinge
SOLVED
Guess another day of waiting for an answer is gonna pass

Which settings are you referring to?

I can change graphics settings etc, as well as the game module that is loaded from the game's launcher. Admittedly I see no option to reset anything to a default, but I'd turn everything to minimum as a first step if I was having problems.
The general settings, I don't mind digging through files if I have to.
